result.title: 455B. A Lot Of Games
result.content:
Hi,

Recently I tried solving 455B. A Lot of Games. Unfortunately, with my code (here: 9279876) I get WA test 62. I would appreciate it if someone could debug it for me.. I have tried for 1 hour unsuccessfully :(.

I will describe my algorithm here:

We will conduct a type of "dp" on each node. For each node, if it has no sons, then we are forced to win at that node. If it has a son, at which we force a loss for the first player, then the first player can win at this node (since the second player "becomes" the first player at the node's son). The first player can force a loss for himself at a node if he forces a win for the first player at any of the node's sons.
